knimeNode.name: LarvaHead
knimeNode.shortDescription: Determines the head of two larva ends

fullDescription.intro: Determines the head of two larva ends. Additionally the table can be sorted by time and rows containing equal time information can be merged

ports.inPort: The points of the two larva ends (x-value, y-value), centroid, center, time
ports.outPort: Larva head and larva end (x-value, y-value)
